PHRASE.LANG: Are they pants? Are they shorts? Why pidgeon hole yourself.[#Legal]
Sont-ils pantalons? Sont-ils shorts? Pourquoi se classer. [#Legal]
Sind sie hose? Sind sie shorts? Warum isolieren sich. [#Legal]
Sono pantaloni? Sono pantaloncini? Perché ti isolano. [#Legal]
¿Son los pantalones? ¿Son pantalones cortos? ¿Por qué aislarse. [#Legal]
Are they pants? Are they shorts? Why pidgeon hole yourself.[#Legal]
